title: UI Design Basics

title: The 4 Core Principles
content:

keyTakeaway: Remember C.R.A.P: Contrast, Repetition, Alignment, Proximity.

question: What does visual hierarchy help users do?

options.feedback: Color is one tool, but hierarchy is about importance, not just color.
Correct! Visual hierarchy guides users' attention to the most important elements first.

options.text: Count the number of elements on screen
options.feedback: Hierarchy isn't about quantity - it's about guiding attention effectively.
